description: 1 x Mature Field Maple (applicants ref. T1) -Approximately 6.00m: Thin crown density throughout by 20%. Reduce overlong branches by approximately 1.00m back into main crown structure. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.Goat Willow (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 10.00m: Thin crown density throughout by 20% Reduce by 1.50m-2.00m. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Mature Apple (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 6.00m: Reduce back to previous and most recent reduction points. Thin crown density by 20%. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Sorbus (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 8.00m: Thin crown density by 20%. Reduce overlong extraneous branches back into main crown structure, approximately 1.20m. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.Mature Oak (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 13.00m: Thin crown density by 15%-20%. Remove dead wood throughout crown. Remove epicormic growth. General maintenance.1 x Bay (applicants ref. T6 ) Approximately 3.00m: Trim back to previous reduction points and shape, approximately 0.5m. General maintenance.1 x Mature Pittosporum (applicants ref. T7) - Approximately 5.00m: Trim to tidy and shape up to 0.30m. General maintenance.1 x Mature Pittosporum (applicants ref. T8) - Approximately 5.00m: Trim to tidy and shape up to 0.30m. General maintenance.1 x Holly (applicantsref. T9) - Approximately 5.00m: Remove dead wood throughout, lightly trim up to 0.30m. General maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
